summary: Frontend theme tokens and background were updated to a trading/alpha aesthetic, with new layout styling and several coin flow robustness improvements (directory resolution, symbol normalization, empty/error states). Backend changes shown are truncated and do not provide evidence for the required market-cap fair-launch and creator market-cap aggregation fixes.

missing_requirements.requirement: Ensure fair-launch behavior by making market cap start at exactly 0 for every newly created asset until there is real market activity establishing a price (price=0 => market cap=0 when no price-discovery data).
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary for backend/main.mo does not show any market-cap/price-discovery logic changes; only coin creation and state/type definitions are visible in the provided truncation.

missing_requirements.requirement: Fix backend creator market-cap aggregation correctness (sum of each created coinâ€™s market cap = current price * totalSupply) and ensure ranking iterates over actual users/creators, keeping metric as creator market cap.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary does not include any visible implementation of getCreatorCapRanking / getCreatorCoinsWithMarketCaps aggregation logic or iteration source changes; backend changes are truncated before any such functions are shown.

hallucinated_features.description: Added an anti-impersonation/real-name verification checkbox requirement in the profile creation modal.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest does not request new profile-creation verification/checkbox behavior; it focuses on theme/background changes and market-cap/coin-flow correctness without adding new product requirements.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("ProfileSetupModal" summary: "name verification checkbox requiring users to confirm their real name")
